name: Fullscreen Clock
tagline: Display a clock on all of your inactive screens when running an application in fullscreen mode.
body:
# Fullscreen Clock

Display a clock on all of your inactive screens when running an application in fullscreen mode.

## Screenshot
[![screenshot](http://www.tilltheis.de/public/projects/fullscreenclock/screenshot.png)](http://www.tilltheis.de/public/projects/fullscreenclock/screenshot.png)


## Appearance

You can change the appearance settings via the status bar icon or by double-clicking fullscreenclock.app when it's already running.


## System Requirements

You need at least Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
